sentences.en: A strange odor assaulted the nostrils.
sentences.cn: 一种怪味扑鼻而来.

sentences.en: An odor of corruption hangs about him.
sentences.cn: 他浑身散发着腐化堕落的气味。

sentences.en: An odor of decay killed the fragrance of early spring.
sentences.cn: 腐烂的气味驱散了早春的芳香.

sentences.en: He is in bad odor with his friends.
sentences.cn: 他在朋友中声誉不佳.

sentences.en: I smelled the odor of money.
sentences.cn: 我闻到了一股铜臭气。

sentences.en: I smelt a terrible odor.
sentences.cn: 我闻到一股难闻的气味.

sentences.en: Note that I was the only one who got sick in that room and I was the only one who could smell the horrible odor.
sentences.cn: 请注意，我是在那间房子住过的人中唯一一个生病的，同时也是唯一一个能够闻到那股令人作呕气味的人。

sentences.en: Other unpleasant changes may include odor production or alternations in tactile characteristics.
sentences.cn: 另外还有使人感到不愉快的其它现象,诸如产生气味或是手感起变化等情况.

sentences.en: Pewter has an odor.
sentences.cn: 锡器有一股臭气。

sentences.en: The agreeable odor of lunch drifted down to him from above.
sentences.cn: 中饭的香味从楼上传到了他鼻子里.

sentences.en: The air was saturated with the odor of the Caporals he smoked.
sentences.cn: 空气里弥漫着他抽的卡珀拉尔粗烟丝的气味.

sentences.en: The flowers of the pink are pink, white and have a pleasant, sharp odor.
sentences.cn: 石竹花有粉红色 、 白色、具有一种浓郁的馥香.

sentences.en: The odor of souls is a brace to the walls.
sentences.cn: 灵魂的气息是这些砖墙的支柱.

sentences.en: The researchers demonstrate that it is possible to generate odor in a compact device that can fit on the back of a TV with potentially thousands of odors.
sentences.cn: 研究员表示，将一个可以散发上千种气味的小型设备安装在电视背后，从而实现电视(根据情景)生成气味是可能的。

sentences.en: The two composting processes produce an odor - free, stabilized material.
sentences.cn: 这两种堆肥工艺都能产生无味 、 稳定的产品.

sentences.en: The whole herb has a characteristic taste and odor.
sentences.cn: 整株药草有种独特的味道和气味。

sentences.en: Their foul odor filled me with horror and disgust.
sentences.cn: 它们令人作呕的臭味使我心中充满恐怖和厌恶.

sentences.en: There is an aged odor in this part of the city.
sentences.cn: 在这个大都会的一角总有那么一股积年的秽气.

sentences.en: These boys were in bad odor because they were suspected of stealing.
sentences.cn: 这些男孩因有盗窃嫌疑而声誉不佳.

sentences.en: These problems are indicated by a strong odor of fuel.
sentences.cn: 这些故障可根据强烈的燃油味来诊断.

sentences.en: This bat is noted for its weird "hairdo", and for the strange odor males use to attract females during courtship.
sentences.cn: 这种蝙蝠以其怪异的“发型”以及求偶期雄性为了吸引雌性所使用的奇怪气味而著称。

words.tran_cn: 臭的，散发气味的；芬芳的
洒香水于；给…添味，给…加臭味

phrases.tran_cn: 臭气控制，气味控制；四氟化硅处理
